mapper.select: select v.vol_no volunteer_no, v.title volunteer_title, v.start_dt volunteer_start_dt, v.end_dt volunteer_end_dt, v.start_time volunteer_start_time, v.end_time volunteer_end_time, v.total_cnt volunteer_total_cnt, u.user_no joinUser_no, u.id joinUser_id, u.name joinUser_name, va.user_no, va.vol_no, va.start_time, va.end_time, va.apply_dt, va.created_dt from ftp_vol_apply va inner join ftp_vol v on va.vol_no=v.vol_no inner join ftp_user u on va.user_no=u.user_no where v.vol_no=#{volNo} order by va.apply_dt desc
